Name: inquiry-editor
Label: Inquiry Editor

Components.Label: Incoterm
Customer
POD
POL
Components.Query: {    "sql": "select * from [Terminal] as ds",    "total": "select count(ds.Id) as total from [Terminal] as ds"}

Components.Label: Destination
Components.Query: {    "sql": "select * from [Terminal] as ds",    "total": "select count(ds.Id) as total from [Terminal] as ds"}

Components.Label: Commodity
InquiryDetail
Components.DefaultVal:
{
    "InquiryId": this.EditForm.Entity.Id,
    "PolId": this.EditForm.Entity.PolId,
    "PodId": this.EditForm.Entity.PodId,
    "EtaDate": this.EditForm.Entity.EtaDate,
    "EtdDate": this.EditForm.Entity.EtdDate,
    "CW": this.EditForm.Entity.CW,
    "GW": this.EditForm.Entity.GW,
    "CBM": this.EditForm.Entity.CBM,
    "StatusId": 1,
    "VoucherTypeId": 1
}

Components.Label: Unit
Create Quote
Components.Query:
select DefaultFee.*,FeeType.Description as FeeType,FeeType.IsFreight,FeeType.GroupName as GroupFee,MasterData.Name as UnitName
from DefaultFee
left join FeeType on DefaultFee.DescriptionId = FeeType.Id
left join MasterData on DefaultFee.UnitId = MasterData.Id
where InquiryDetailId in ('{InquiryDetailIds}')
order by DefaultFee.UnitId asc

select Pricing.*,p.PartnerTypeIdsText,p.ResidenceTypeIdText
from InquiryDetail
left join Pricing on InquiryDetail.PricingId = Pricing.Id
left join [Partner] p on pricing.VendorId = p.Id
where InquiryDetail.Id in ('{InquiryDetailIds}')

GridPolicies.Label: User
Group
Progress
GridPolicies.DisabledExp:
var rs = !((this.Entity.UserReceiverId == this.Token.UserId || (this.Token.TeamId && this.Entity.GroupReceiverId == this.Token.TeamId)) && this.Entity.ProgressId != 3);
return rs;

GridPolicies.Label: Status

Components.Label: Create Quote
Components.Query:
select DefaultFee.*,FeeType.Description as FeeType,FeeType.IsFreight,FeeType.GroupName as GroupFee,MasterData.Name as UnitName
from DefaultFee
left join FeeType on DefaultFee.DescriptionId = FeeType.Id
left join MasterData on DefaultFee.UnitId = MasterData.Id
where InquiryDetailId in ('{InquiryDetailIds}')
order by DefaultFee.UnitId asc

select Pricing.*,p.PartnerTypeIdsText,p.ResidenceTypeIdText
from InquiryDetail
left join Pricing on InquiryDetail.PricingId = Pricing.Id
left join [Partner] p on pricing.VendorId = p.Id
where InquiryDetail.Id in ('{InquiryDetailIds}')
